resources.string: This is an online doctor prescription application which will help the patient to choose the medicine to use during some specific symptoms.In this patient will enter the symptoms and will get the corresponding medicines related to the symptoms.In this application you have to first register yourslf by entering your name and mobile no and then enter the symptoms and you will get the corresponding medicines related to symptoms.

1.Specialist of Allergist/Immunologist"

"									"TIPS TO STAY HEALTHY"

" 1. Eat lots of fruit and veg."
" 2. Eat less salt no more than 6g a day."
" 3. Get active and be a healthy weight."
" 4. Do not skip breakfast."
" 5. Eat your meals the same time every day."
" 6. Stay clear of coughers and sneezers."
" 7. Snack on an apple a day for healthier arteries."
" 8. Wash your hands before you cook."
" 9. Make milk one of your daily drinks."
" 10.Traveling somewhere exotic? Pack hand sanitizer."
"

"									"PRECAUTIONS"

" 1. Do not take your medicine with cold water."
" 2. Do not eat heavy meals after 5:00pm"
" 3. Drink more water in morning.less at night."
" 4. Best sleeping time is 10:00pm to 4:00pm."
" 5. Do not lie down immediately after taking meal."
" 6. Answer the phone calls from left ear."
" 7. Avoid smoking."
" 8. Cut down on salt."
" 9. Monitor your BP,boold sugar and cholesterol."
" 10 manage your stress level."
"
